keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket
keyPolicies.policyDescription: You will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair chance for every child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Smaller class sizes, £2.5 billion extra for schools and scrap university tuition fees.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient affordable homes.
Make politicians accountable and give YOU the right to sack corrupt MPs.

mentions.tacticalSituation: People across Britain who are fed up with Labour are turning to the LibDems for real change. It's clear the Tories won't change a thing. Their top priority is to cut taxes for the rich.

issues.education: £2.5 billion extra for schools and scrap university tuition fees.
issues.environment: Invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient affordable homes.
issues.governance: Make politicians accountable and give YOU the right to sack corrupt MPs.
issues.socialWelfare: You will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

housing.content: Invest in ... energy efficient affordable homes.

quotes.text: The LibDems have a costed plan to protect NHS frontline services, put 3,000 more police on patrol and cut tax by £700 for millions of people across Britain.
We are the only party with a plan to balance the books and offer the recession. Labour and Tories just make promises they rarely keep.

images.caption: Philip Ling smiling, with text describing his support for fairness, future, and trust.
Lib Dem leaders Vince Cable and Nick Clegg, with text highlighting the four steps to a fairer Britain.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Philip Ling is described as 29, born and brought up in Warwick before studying economics at the University of Bath. Married to Vicky, from Droitwich. Works as an economist for the Cabinet Office and currently for a retail bank.
